main event: A UFO of indefinite shape with blinking lights emitted a brilliant flash and moved upward at a rapid rate before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed to be the apparent size of a silver dollar,The sighting lasted about 15 seconds,The UFO left a light trail as it disappeared,The report was documented on March 6, 1958, by the 2849th Air Base Wing at Hill Air Force Base in Utah,The object's movement involved a steady glow, resembling a cloud but maintaining its shape.
sighted object: indefinite shape UFO with blinking lights
witness description: Elys A. Greenhulgh, management analyzing, Army, U.S. Civil Service
